title: How to Check Your Messages in Destiny

steps.headline: When you have a notification hovering over the Last City, move the cursor over it.
steps.description: If it says New Message, set a course for the Last City.

steps.headline: Once you're at the Last City, find the Post Master.
steps.description: He is an Exo, and is right near the front of the open balcony where you start.

steps.headline: Press and Hold 'X/Square' to talk to the Post Master.
Click on the new message.
steps.description: It could be a notice, reward, or others.

steps.headline: Exit and check the content of your message.

text: When you have a notification hovering over the Last City, move the cursor over it. If it says New Message, set a course for the Last City. Once you're at the Last City, find the Post Master. He is an Exo, and is right near the front of the open balcony where you start. Press and Hold 'X/Square' to talk to the Post Master.  Click on the new message. It could be a notice, reward, or others. Exit and check the content of your message.
